pinyin: zui4 gao1 gong1 zi1 xian4 e2

definition: piece rate wage/remuneration based on one's output/opposite: time rate wage 計時工資|计时工资[ji4 shi2 gong1 zi1]
time rate wage/remuneration based on one's time and skill/opposite: piece rate wage 計件工資|计件工资[ji4 jian4 gong1 zi1]

sentences.english: Do we get a salary slip even if we sign up for direct deposit ?
sentences.chinese: 如果工資直接存款的話，能拿到工資條嗎？

sentences.english: Do we get a salary slip even if we sign up for direct deposit ?
sentences.chinese: 如果工資直接存款的話，能拿到工資條嗎？

sentences.english: Today I receive salary RMB 0000 from Modim Fashion Corporation Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 今收到牧鼎服飾公司工資0000元整。

sentences.english: I did the payroll in the job I had before that.
sentences.chinese: 在那以前的工作中我做過工資表。

sentences.english: They docked a third of his wages.
sentences.chinese: 他們扣掉他三分之一工資。

sentences.english: The bonus pay for this month is almost twice that of the basic salary .
sentences.chinese: 這個月效益工資都快是基本工資的兩倍了。

sentences.english: The bonus pay for this month is almost twice that of the basic salary .
sentences.chinese: 這個月效益工資都快是基本工資的兩倍了。

sentences.english: The ill-balanced payment system may have a lot of side effect.
sentences.chinese: 這個不平衡的工資系統將產生許多副作用。

sentences.english: Fourpence was a private soldier's daily pay at that time.
sentences.chinese: 當時二等兵每天的工資是四便士。

sentences.english: He always uses his salary to help students in need.
sentences.chinese: 他經常拿自己的工資幫補生活困難的學生。

sentences.english: You are a bit  scatty so you don't check names on payslips before opening them.
sentences.chinese: 你有點笨，所以纔沒覈實工資單上的名字就打開看。

sentences.english: they don't pay fair wages, their hours are inhumane,
sentences.chinese: 工資不合理，工作時間太沒人性了。

sentences.english: The first thing to deal with for the coming month is your overall income.
sentences.chinese: 你要做的第一件事就是估算你全部的工資收入。

sentences.english: The book, which he borrowed from me yesterday, cost 1/3 of my salary.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天從我這兒借走的那本書花了我三分之一的工資。

sentences.english: Slide 7: Save for retirement starting with your first pay check.
sentences.chinese: 退休存款從你的第一張工資條開始。

sentences.english: The occupiers immediately froze wages and made strikes illegal .
sentences.chinese: 佔領軍立即宣佈凍結工資並規定罷工爲非法。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
